description: Insert description of the world/game here.

v0.1.0-alpha.description:
### FIRST ALPHA LETS GO!!!

Follow the readme.md for install.

**Features include:**
- Multiple win conditions
- Progressive Weapons and Armors
- Locations include Endemic Life, most Quests, and Specialized Tools
- Loot Boxes as a fun filler item

**Known Issues:**
- Currently no logic or testing for non-Iceborne games. Make sure you pick settings with that in mind and expect potential issues.
- Flickering Rain in the Ancient Forest (No idea what causes this)
- Archipelago saves will not happen properly if you have never successfully connected to the server (Alpha things)
- Late game hasn't been thoroughly tested so potentially expect issues
v0.1.0-alpha.title: Alpha v0.1.0

v0.1.1-alpha.description:
Note: This patch will work with older games. You can run the generator or just replace the .dll in NativePC to fix the master rank goal completion.

**FIXES**
- Made it so that completing the Master Rank goal will actually send it out.
- Renamed Trap Loot Boxes to Utility Loot Box to avoid confusion.
- Fixed the yaml description to display the correct game win condition for low rank.

**Known Issues:**
- Currently no logic or testing for non-Iceborne games. Make sure you pick settings with that in mind and expect potential issues.
- Flickering Rain in the Ancient Forest (No idea what causes this)
- Archipelago saves will not happen properly if you have never successfully connected to the server (Alpha things)
- Late game hasn't been thoroughly tested so potentially expect issues
v0.1.1-alpha.title: Alpha v0.1.1

v0.1.2-alphar2.description:
Note: This patch will work with older games. You can run the generator or just replace the .dll in NativePC to fix the master rank goal completion. However, any changes to logic will not be applied unless games are regenerated with new apworld.

**FIXES**
- The quest "Kushala Daora, Dragon of Steel" and "Teostra the Infernal" should no longer have their checks swapped.
- Fixed the quest "The Current Situation" having the wrong location ID.
- Fixed being able to craft armors if you had the materials even if you didn't have the proper progressive armor.
- Fixed not being able to get bandit mantle and hopefully any other specialized equipment that fell under the same issue.
- Removed Mega Dash Juice and Exhaust Phial from the loot pool due to them being unattainable normally and thus unusable.
- Fixed a bunch of logic for Endemic Life. All Iceborne added life has been pushed back to unlocking with master rank. This may change since there is unclear information that if the life unlocks with the DLC or once you reach the DLC content.
- Added support of Archipelago 0.7.0. Might cause issues.
- Fixed a bunch of typos.

**Known Issues:**
- Currently no logic or testing for non-Iceborne games. Make sure you pick settings with that in mind and expect potential issues.
- Flickering Rain in the Ancient Forest (No idea what causes this)
- Archipelago saves will not happen properly if you have never successfully connected to the server (Alpha things)
- Late game hasn't been thoroughly tested so potentially expect issues
v0.1.2-alphar2.title: Alpha v0.1.2
